online.common
Class commonRootApplet

java.lang.Object
  online.common.commonRootApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, lib.RootAppletProtocol, OnlineConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
RootApplet
public abstract class commonRootApplet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, lib.RootAppletProtocol, OnlineConstants

this is the common implementation of many things that are nominally handled by the applet root.

Author:
ddyer
